item.title: 性、权力和性高潮冥想崇拜的衰落
item.description:
OneTaste的前领导人曾是妇女赋权的先锋，但艾伦-休特（Ellen Huet）的著作《性高潮帝国》（Empire of Orgasm）节选展示了她们是如何成为被定罪的重罪犯的，而这些重罪犯不会介意特朗普的赦免。【原文：

OneTaste’s former leaders were once the seeming vanguard of women’s empowerment, but an excerpt from Ellen Huet’s book Empire of Orgasm shows how they became convicted felons who wouldn’t mind a Trump pardon.

】

item.title: 微软寄希望于艾利克斯-厄尔这样的 "影响者 "来缩小与 ChatGPT 的差距
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）急于提高其 Copilot 聊天机器人的下载量，因此招募了一些美国最受欢迎的有影响力的人，向年轻消费者传递一个信息，这个信息可以概括为："我们的人工智能助手和 ChatGPT 一样酷：我们的人工智能助手和 ChatGPT 一样酷。【原文：Microsoft Corp., eager to boost downloads of its Copilot chatbot, has recruited some of the most popular influencers in America to push a message to young consumers that might be summed up as: Our AI assistant is as cool as ChatGPT.】

item.title: 德意志银行即将与欧洲投资基金达成 SRT 交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）即将与欧洲投资基金（European Investment Fund）完成一项重大的风险转移交易。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is close to completing a significant risk transfer deal with the European Investment Fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市大跌让盈利增长成为最强劲的牛市支柱
item.description: 美股动荡的一周动摇了牛市的根基。人工智能支出突然显得挥霍无度。裁员潮削弱了人们对就业市场的信心。低端消费者开始屈服。【原文：A turbulent week for US stocks has shaken the bull case to its foundation. Artificial intelligence spending suddenly looks profligate. A wave of layoffs eroded confidence in the job market. The low-end consumer is starting to buckle.】

item.title: 巴克莱出售 2014 年以来首批欧元 AT1，风险情绪有所改善
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）正抓住风险情绪改善的机会，出售其自 2014 年以来的首笔欧元货币附加一级债务。【原文：Barclays Plc is seizing on an improvement in risk sentiment to sell its first euro currency Additional Tier 1 debt since 2014.】

item.title: 中国汽车销量下降，补贴政策终止影响需求
item.description: 由于地方政府逐步取消以旧换新计划，加上需求持续低迷，中国 10 月份乘用车销量出现一年多来的首次下滑。【原文：China’s passenger car sales dropped in October for the first time in more than a year as the gradual phasing out of local government trade-in programs add to ongoing headwinds that are hurting demand.】

item.title: Nvidia 家乡的数据中心空置等待供电
item.description:
加利福尼亚州圣克拉拉市两处设施的命运凸显了美国科技行业乃至整个经济面临的重大挑战。【原文：

The fate of two facilities in Santa Clara, California, highlights a major challenge for the US tech sector and indeed the wider economy.

item.title: 美国港口在假日冷清和关税困境中面临 "货物衰退
item.description: 新数据显示，由于关税的不确定性给货主带来压力，且消费者支出前景依然阴云密布，预计美国的进口量将在年底假期和2026年放缓。【原文：US import volumes are projected to slow through the year-end holidays and into 2026, as tariff uncertainty weighs on cargo owners and the outlook for consumer spending remains clouded, new data show.】

item.title: 策略师称稳健盈利将推动美股明年反弹
item.description: 一些华尔街策略师认为，随着利率前景不明朗的风险被证明是短暂的，强劲的企业盈利将在 2026 年推动美股反弹。【原文：Robust corporate earnings will power the US stock rally in 2026 as risks around an uncertain rates outlook prove short-lived, according to some Wall Street strategists.】

item.title: 重组言论引发塞内加尔欧洲债券创纪录最大跌幅
item.description: 塞内加尔总理在与国际货币基金组织进行了 "艰难 "的会谈后表示，他将反对重组该国的债务，此后该国的欧元债券大幅下跌。【原文：Senegal’s eurobonds plunged after the country’s prime minister said he would oppose restructuring the country’s debt following “difficult” talks with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 奇货可居：中国房地产如何成为巨大泡沫（播客）
item.description: 土地是一种奇怪的资产。我们需要负担得起的土地，因为每个人都需要有地方居住。但对许多人来说，房地产也是他们最大的财富储备；是一种国家储蓄罐，既能为个人财富提供动力，也能为更广泛的经济提供动力。这种紧张关系在中国尤为突出，尽管房地产一直是家庭和公司财富的巨大推动力，但中国的住房负担能力仍然是一个重大挑战。中国的政策制定者们多年来一直在努力让中国的房地产市场保持稳定。【原文：Land is a weird asset. We need it to be affordable because everyone needs somewhere to live. But for many people, real estate is also their biggest store of wealth — a kind of national piggybank that fuels both personal fortunes and broader economies. Nowhere is that tension sharper than in China, where housing affordability remains a major challenge even as real estate has been a huge driver of wealth for households and companies alike. China’s policymakers have now spent years trying to let th】

item.description: Human Made Inc.是一家日本街头服饰公司，由创造了 A Bathing Ape (BAPE) 时装系列的著名设计师 Nigo 创办。【原文：Human Made Inc., a Japanese streetwear firm founded by celebrity designer Nigo who created the A Bathing Ape (BAPE) fashion line, boosted the price of its initial share sale after solid investor demand.】

item.title: 诺和诺德退出美特斯邦威收购战后股价上涨
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk A/S）股价上涨，原因是这家丹麦制药商退出了对肥胖症药物开发商美塞拉公司（Metsera Inc.【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S shares rose after the Danish drugmaker withdrew from a $10 billion takeover battle for obesity drug developer Metsera Inc., clearing the way for Pfizer Inc.】

item.title: 迪拜萨马纳计划发行伊斯兰债券和首次公开募股，房地产市场繁荣刺激交易增长
item.description: 迪拜的 Samana Developers 公司计划首次利用伊斯兰债务市场，加入越来越多的房地产公司的行列，寻求利用该酋长国持续时间最长的房地产热潮。【原文：Dubai’s Samana Developers plans to tap Islamic debt markets for the first time, joining a growing list of real estate firms seeking to capitalize on the emirate’s longest running property boom.】

item.title: 私募基金正在寻找首次公开募股后套现的新方法
item.description: 私募股权公司正面临双重困境。首次公开募股（IPO）市场是退出投资的通常途径，目前已逐渐重新开放，但还不足以让他们完全套现。获得报酬的 B 选项，即通过将资金列入公司资产负债表来借钱，只会使第一个问题变得更糟，因为这会吓坏股权投资者。【原文：Private equity firms are facing a double dilemma. IPO markets, the usual path for exiting investments, have been gradually reopening, but not enough for them to cash out completely. Option B for getting paid, borrowing the money by putting it on the company’s balance sheet, will only make the first problem worse by spooking equity investors.】

item.title: 印度考虑提高食糖出口配额以避免即将出现的供应过剩问题
item.description: 印度正在考虑允许糖厂在 2025-26 年度出口 150 万吨甜味剂的提案，因为丰收的前景引发了对即将出现的供应过剩的担忧。【原文：India is considering a proposal to allow sugar mills to export 1.5 million tons of the sweetener in 2025-26, as the outlook for an abundant harvest raises concerns about a looming glut.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧任命刘易斯为首席执行官，英国蒸馏酒商寻求改革
item.description: 随着健力士黑啤和尊尼获加的生产商在股价暴跌后寻求重振旗鼓，帝亚吉欧集团任命连锁超市乐购集团（Tesco Plc）前总裁戴夫-刘易斯（Dave Lewis）为新任首席执行官。【原文：Diageo Plc named Dave Lewis, the former head of supermarket chain Tesco Plc, its new chief executive officer as the maker of Guinness stout and Johnnie Walker seeks to reboot after a slump in its share price.】

item.title: 增长前景改善，高盛转为增持印度股票
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）已转为增持印度股票，预计政府政策和企业盈利改善将帮助印度这个价值 5.4 万亿美元的市场赶上亚洲同行。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has turned overweight on Indian stocks, expecting government policies and improving corporate earnings to help the nation’s $5.4 trillion market catch up with Asian peers.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数直播：美国即将结束停摆，股市将反弹

item.description: 燃料价格上涨后，埃及通胀率自 5 月份以来首次加快，这增加了政府下周维持利率不变的可能性。【原文：Egyptian inflation quickened for the first time since May after a hike in fuel prices, increasing the likelihood authorities will leave interest rates unchanged next week.】

item.title: 美国政府停摆问题取得突破，国债收益率上升
item.description: 在美国参议院提出结束美国政府史上最长停摆的计划后，避险资产需求减弱，国债收益率全线上涨。【原文：Treasury yields rose across the curve as the demand for haven assets waned after the US Senate advanced a plan to end the longest US government shutdown in history.】

item.title: 英国濒临破产的资产为其垃圾贷款带来意想不到的优势
item.description: 加税迫在眉睫。借贷成本居高不下。通货膨胀率仍然远远高于目标。但对于英国公司的投资者来说，至少有一个亮点：英镑垃圾贷款。【原文：Tax rises loom. Borrowing costs remain stubbornly high. And inflation is still way above target. But for investors in UK companies there’s at least one bright spot: sterling junk loans.】

item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. reported slowing growth in its revenue in October, potentially another indication that AI demand is moderating as the market turns frothy.】

item.title: 据说外籍员工宿舍公司 TS Group 的所有者正在考虑出售该公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，新加坡外籍劳工专用宿舍供应商 TS Group Pte 的股东正在考虑出售该公司的控股权，交易价值可能至少为 5 亿新元（3.84 亿美元）。【原文：Shareholders of TS Group Pte, a Singapore-based provider of purpose-built foreign worker dormitories, are considering selling a controlling stake in the business in a deal that could be worth at least S$500 million ($384 million), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国停摆临近结束，新兴市场股票和货币上涨
item.description: 新兴市场亚洲股市上涨，原因是对美国政府结束史上最长停摆的乐观情绪提振了风险偏好。【原文：Emerging-market Asian stocks rose as optimism over an end to the longest-ever US government shutdown boosted risk appetite.】

item.title: 雅加达校园爆炸事件后，印尼考虑限制电子游戏
item.description: 在雅加达发生一起造成近百人受伤的校园爆炸事件后，印度尼西亚正在权衡对《PUBG》等视频游戏的限制措施。【原文：Indonesia is weighing restrictions on video games like PUBG following a school blast in Jakarta that injured nearly a hundred.】

item.title: 沃达康报告利润创十多年来最大增幅
item.description: 沃达康集团（Vodacom Group Ltd.）上半年的利润猛增了三分之一，南非移动运营商在非洲大陆其他地区业务的盈利改善推动了利润十多年来的最大跃升。【原文：Vodacom Group Ltd. profit jumped by a third in the first half, with improved earnings at the South African mobile operator’s businesses elsewhere on the continent driving the biggest jump in profit in more than a decade.】
